title: Cancer Drugmaker Turnstone Biologics Raises $80 Million
sub_head: The startup is developing two types of immunotherapy for cancer
body:
Cancer-drug startup Turnstone Biologics Corp. has collected $80 million in new funding as venture-capital investment in oncology companies continues to climb.
U.S. and European cancer drugmakers secured $6.9 billion in venture funding in the first half of this year, according to Silicon Valley Bank, after raising $6 billion in all of 2019 and $7.7 billion in all of last year.
Innovation...
